sourcesContent:
<template>
  <cus-wraper>
    <cus-page-title :label="$t('route.dataRelease')" />
    <el-form  :model="selectForm" ref="selectForm" label-width="auto" label-position="right">
      <el-row  :gutter="20">
        <el-col :span="7">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('rule.productDetailType')">
            <cus-select :codetype="'ProductCategory'" clearable  @change="selectedDetailTypeChanged"
                        filterable v-model="searchpdRegionType"></cus-select>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
        <el-col :span="7">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('customComponents.product')">
            <el-select  @change="editionSelect" clearable filterable  v-model="selectForm.pdCode">
              <el-option
                :key="index"
                :label="item.pdCode+':'+item.pdName"
                :value="item.pdCode"
                v-for="(item,index) in selectData">
              </el-option>
            </el-select>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
        <el-col :span="7">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('customComponents.pdEdition')" prop="pdEdition">
            <el-select  clearable filterable  v-model="selectForm.pdEdition">
              <el-option
                :key="index"
                :label="item.pdEdition"
                :value="item.pdEdition"
                v-for="(item,index) in selectEdition">
              </el-option>
            </el-select>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
      </el-row>
      <el-row  :gutter="20">
        <el-col :span="7">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('i18nView.pdFileType')">
            <cus-cascader :codetype="'pdfiletype'" :placeholder="$t('i18nView.pdFileType')" class="cusSelect"
                           clearable v-model="selectForm.pdFileType"></cus-cascader>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
        <cus-btn-wrapper>
        <el-button  size="small" @click="searchDataByCondition" icon="el-icon-search" type="primary" >{{$t('pddataRelease.search') }}</el-button>
        </cus-btn-wrapper>
      </el-row>
    </el-form>
    <cus-table-title :label="$t('pddataRelease.productFile')" />
    <el-table :data="tableData" border element-loading-text="Loading" fit highlight-current-row max-height="500"
              size="mini" style="width: 100%" @selection-change="handleSelectionChange">
      <el-table-column type="selection" width="55px" align="center"></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.id')" align="center" type="index"></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('i18nView.pdCode')" align="center"  prop="pdCode" sortable></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('i18nView.pdName')" align="center"  prop="pdName"></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('customComponents.pdEdition')" align="center"
                       prop="pdEdition"></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('i18nView.pdFileType')" align="center"  prop="pdFileType" :filter-method="filterHandler"
                       :filters="pdFileTypeFilters">
        <template v-slot="scope">{{scope.row.pdFileType | filter_getFileType}}</template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('pddataRelease.pdFileName')" align="center"  prop="pdFileName">
        <template v-slot="scope">{{scope.row.pdFileName | filter_getFileName}}</template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('pddataRelease.pdFileDesc')" align="center" prop="pdFileDesc"></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :filter-method="filterHandler" :filters="content" :label="$t('pddataRelease.pdUpdDepmt')"
                       align="center" prop="pdUpdDepmt">
        <template v-slot="scope">{{scope.row.pdUpdDepmt | filter_getUpdDepmt}}</template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('pddataRelease.pdUpDate')" align="center" prop="createTime" sortable></el-table-column>
    </el-table>
    <cus-form-title :label="$t('table.publish')"></cus-form-title>
    <el-form v-if="showRele" ref="PdtempPdDataRlsForm" :inline="true" :model="PdtempPddatarelease" :rules="rules"
             label-width="auto" label-position="right" style="margin-left: 55px;">
      <!-- 发布方式 -->
      <el-row :gutter="10" class="row-bg" justify="left" type="flex">
          <el-form-item prop="pdReleWay" :label="$t('i18nView.releaseMethod')">
            <el-input disabled v-model="PdtempPddatarelease.pdReleWay">
            </el-input>
          </el-form-item>
      </el-row>
      <!-- 发布说明 -->
      <el-row>
        <el-form-item :label="$t('i18nView.releaseDetails')" prop="pdReleDetails" >
          <el-input v-model="PdtempPddatarelease.pdReleDetails"
                    maxlength="500"
                    :placeholder="$t('i18nView.pleInput')"
                    show-word-limit
                    style="width: 588px;"
                    type="textarea">
          </el-input>
        </el-form-item>
      </el-row>
      <el-row :gutter="10" class="row-bg" justify="center" type="flex">
        <el-col :span="24">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('i18nView.pdAuditConc')" prop="pdAuditConc">
            <el-checkbox-group v-model="PdtempPddatarelease.pdAuditConc" @change="showPath">
              <el-checkbox v-for="path in pdtempPdReleSyspathList" :key="path.id" :label="path">
                {{ path.pdReleSysname }}
              </el-checkbox>
            </el-checkbox-group>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
      </el-row>
      <el-row v-if="tableflag">
        <el-table :data="pathtableData" align="center" border class="wraper-table" fit highlight-current-row>
          <el-table-column align="center" :label="$t('table.id')" type="index" width="55px"></el-table-column>
          <el-table-column :label="$t('')" align="center"
                           prop="pdReleSysname"></el-table-column>
          <el-table-column :label="$t('i18nView.pdReleIp')" align="center"
                           prop="pdReleIp"></el-table-column>
          <el-table-column :label="$t('i18nView.pdRelePort')" align="center"
                           prop="pdRelePort"></el-table-column>
          <el-table-column :label="$t('i18nView.pdUsername')" align="center"
                           prop="pdUsername"></el-table-column>
        </el-table>
      </el-row>
      <el-row :gutter="10" class="row-bg" type="flex">
        <el-col :span="24">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('i18nView.pdReleFileName')">
            <el-input v-model="PdtempPddatarelease.pdReleFile" readonly style="width: 588px"></el-input>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
      </el-row>
      <!--发布确认按钮-->
      <el-row>
        <el-col :span="24" align="right">
          <el-button  size="small" icon="el-icon-success" :disabled="releButton" type="primary" @click="submitReleInfo(PdtempPddatarelease)">
            {{ $t('pddataRelease.releBut') }}
          </el-button>
          <el-button  size="small" :disabled="releButton" icon="el-icon-refresh" type="primary" @click="refreshPage()">
            {{ $t('pddataRelease.releRefresh') }}
          </el-button>
        </el-col>
      </el-row>
    </el-form>
  </cus-wraper>
</template>
<script>

  import {findAllProductByPdDetailType} from "@/api/basicinfo/pdclaimverification"
  import {queryPddataRelease,downloadFile,relePdIncre} from "@/api/basicinfo/pddatarelease"
  import { getAllPath } from '@/api/basicinfo/pdtemppdrelease'
  let _this
  export default {
    name: 'pddataRelease',
    filters: {
      filter_getFileType(code) {
        if (code != null) {
          return _this.getCascaderCodeName('pdfiletype', code);
        }
      },
      filter_getFileName(code) {
        if (code != null) {
          let filename = JSON.parse(code)
          let rename = ''
          for (let i = 0; i < filename.length; i++) {
            if (i === filename.length - 1) {
              rename += filename[i]
            } else {
              rename += filename[i] + "; "
            }
          }
          return rename
        }
      },
      filter_getUpdDepmt(code) {
        if (code != null) {
          return _this.getCodeName('pddepmt', code)
        }
      }
    },
    data() {
      _this = this
      return {
        pdFileTypeFilters:[],
        searchpdRegionType:'',//产品细类
        selectEdition: [],// 搜索  版别 下拉选
        selectData: [],// 搜索  产品 下拉选
        content: [],// 表格  过滤  选项
        //表格数据
        tableData: [],
        //保存参数
        selectForm: {
          pdCode: '',  //产品编码
          pdName: '',  //产品名称
          pdEdition: '',  //产品版别
          pdFileType: [],  //文件类型
        },
        pdtempPdReleSyspathList: [],//发布环境
        //表格多选
        multipleSelection: [],
        PdtempPddatarelease: {
          pdReleWay:'',//发布方式
          pdReleDetails:'',//  发布说明
          pdAuditConc:[],//  发布环境
          pdReleEnv: '',  //  发至环境
          pdReleFile: '',  //  生成文件名


        },
        showRele: false,
        pathtableData: [],//发布环境表格
        tableflag: false,
        releButton: false,
        //检验规则
        rules: {
          pdReleWay: [{required: true, message: '请选择发布方式', trigger: 'change'}],
          pdReleDetails: [{required: true, message: '请输入发布说明', trigger: 'change'}],
          pdAuditConc: [{required: true, message: '请选择发布环境', trigger: 'change'}]
        },
        envList:[]
      }

    },
    computed: {},
    created() {
      this.initQueryTableData();
    },
    watch:{
      'PdtempPddatarelease.pdAuditConc'(val) {
        this.envList = val
      },
      'searchpdRegionType'(){
        if (!this.searchpdRegionType){
          this.selectForm.pdCode='';
          this.selectForm.pdEdition='';
        }
      },
      'selectForm.pdCode'(){
        if (!this.selectForm.pdCode){
          this.selectForm.pdEdition='';
          this.selectEdition=[];
        }
      },
      tableData() {
        if (this.tableData.length > 0) {
          this.pdFileTypeFilters = [];
          this.tableData.forEach(val => {
            this.pdFileTypeFilters.push({
              text: this.getCascaderCodeName('pdfiletype', val.pdFileType),
              value: val.pdFileType
            });
          });
          //文件类型
          this.pdFileTypeFilters = this.pdFileTypeFilters.reduce(function (prev, element) {
            if (!prev.find(el => el.text == element.text)) {
              prev.push(element);
            }
            return prev;
          }, []);
        }
      },
      },
    methods: {
      filterHandler(value, row, column) {
        const property = column['property']
        return row[property] === value
      },
      /*初始化加载表格数据*/
      initQueryTableData() {
        queryPddataRelease(this.buildRequestData(this.selectForm)).then(res => {
          if (res.code === 200) {
            this.tableData = res.data.pddataRelease;
            for (const row of res.data.pddataRelease) {
              let sdata = {code: '', name: '', edition: ''}
              sdata.code = row.pdCode
              sdata.name = row.pdName
              sdata.edition = row.pdEdition
              let filDepmt = {text: '', value: ''}
              filDepmt.text = this.getCodeName('pddepmt', row.pdUpdDepmt, true)
              filDepmt.value = row.pdUpdDepmt
              this.content.push(filDepmt)
            }
            this.content = this.unique(this.content)
          }
        })
      },
      unique(arr) { // 根据唯一标识no来对数组进行过滤
        const res = new Map()  //定义常量 res,值为一个Map对象实例
        //返回arr数组过滤后的结果，结果为一个数组   过滤条件是，如果res中没有某个键，就设置这个键的值为1
        return arr.filter((arr) => !res.has(arr.text) && res.set(arr.text, 1))
      },
      /*搜索部分，选择产品细类，控制产品*/
      selectedDetailTypeChanged(val){
        let param={
          pdRegionType:val
        }
        if("".endsWith(val) || val==undefined){
          return false
        }
        findAllProductByPdDetailType(this.buildRequestData(param)).then(response =>{
          this.selectData =[]
          let detailTypeOptionList =response.data;
          this.selectForm.pdCode='';
          this.selectForm.pdEdition='';
          this.selectEdition=[];
          for (const productOption of  this.tableData) {
            for (const product of detailTypeOptionList) {
              if (productOption.pdCode === product.pdCode) {
                this.selectData.push(productOption)
                break;
              }
            }
          }
          this.selectData = this.selectData.reduce(function(prev, element) {
            if (!prev.find(el => el.pdCode == element.pdCode)) {
              prev.push(element);
            }
            return prev;
          }, []);

        })
      },
      /*搜索部分  选择产品，控制版别*/
      editionSelect(val) {
        this.selectEdition = [];
        if (val) {
          for (const valKey of this.selectData) {
            if (val == valKey.pdCode) {
              let edition = {pdCode: '', pdEdition: ''}
              edition.pdCode = valKey.pdCode
              edition.pdEdition = valKey.pdEdition
              this.selectEdition.push(edition);
            }
          }
          this.selectForm.pdEdition = (this.selectEdition[0].pdEdition)

        }
      },
      //搜索
      searchDataByCondition() {
        let data ={
          pdCode: this.selectForm.pdCode,  //产品编码
          pdName:this.selectForm.pdName,  //产品名称
          pdEdition: this.selectForm.pdEdition,  //产品版别
          pdFileType: this.selectForm.pdFileType,  //文件类型
          pdRegionType:this.searchpdRegionType
        }
        console.log(data)
        queryPddataRelease(this.buildRequestData(data)).then(res => {
          if (res.code === 200) {
            this.tableData = res.data.pddataRelease;
            for (const row of res.data.pddataRelease) {
              let sdata = {code: '', name: '', edition: ''}
              sdata.code = row.pdCode
              sdata.name = row.pdName
              sdata.edition = row.pdEdition
              let filDepmt = {text: '', value: ''}
              filDepmt.text = this.getCodeName('pddepmt', row.pdUpdDepmt, true)
              filDepmt.value = row.pdUpdDepmt
              this.content.push(filDepmt)
            }
            this.content = this.unique(this.content)
          }
        })
      },
      /*文件下载*/
      downloadFile(row) {
        let fileNames = JSON.parse(row.pdFileName);
        let paths = JSON.parse(row.pdFilePath)
        for (let i = 0; i < paths.length; i++) {
          let path = paths[i]
          let fileName = fileNames[i]
          downloadFile(this.buildRequestData({"pdFilePath": path})).then(response => {
            this.downloadResponseFile(response, fileName)
            this.notifySuccess('下载成功')
          })
        }
      },
      /*  多选待发布数据，获取并准备 发布数据  */
      handleSelectionChange(val) {
        this.multipleSelection = [];
        this.checkId = [];
        if (val) {
          this.showRele = val.length > 0;
          for (const valElement of val) {
            this.checkId.push(valElement.id)
          }
          this.multipleSelection = val
          let pdReleWay1='4';
          this.PdtempPddatarelease.pdReleWay = this.filterHandler('releaseway', pdReleWay1);
          this.pdtempPdReleSyspathList = [];
          getAllPath().then(res => {
            for (const argument of res.data) {
              this.pdtempPdReleSyspathList.push(argument)
            }
          })
        }
      },
      //根据key值查value
      filterHandler(codetype, value) {
        return this.getCodeName(codetype, value);
      },
      /*  发布多选-显示环境  */
      showPath(val) {
        this.PdtempPddatarelease.pdReleEnv = '';
        for (const argument of val) {
          this.PdtempPddatarelease.pdReleEnv += argument + ";"
        }
        this.pathtableData = [];
        this.pathtableData = val
        this.tableflag = this.pathtableData.length !== 0
      },
      /*刷新*/
      refreshPage() {
        this.PdtempPddatarelease.pdReleDetails = "";
        this.PdtempPddatarelease.pdAuditConc = [];
        this.tableflag = false;

      },
      /* 发布确认 */
      submitReleInfo() {
        this.$refs.PdtempPdDataRlsForm.validate(pass => {
          if(pass){
            let params ={
              "PdtempPdFileList": this.multipleSelection,
              "pdtempPdReleSyspathList": Array.isArray(this.envList) ? this.envList : Array(this.envList),
              "pdReleWay": "4",
              "pdReleDetails": this.PdtempPddatarelease.pdReleDetails,
              "releType": "2",
              "releTypeDet": "1",
              "pdReleStu": "3",
              "pdReleContend": "1"
            }
            relePdIncre(this.buildRequestData(params)).then(res => {
              this.PdtempPddatarelease.pdReleFile = '';
              if (res.data.length === 1) {
                this.PdtempPddatarelease.pdReleFile = res.data[0].pdReleFileName
                let filePath = res.data[0].pdReleFilePath + "//" + res.data[0].pdReleFileName;
                let fileName = res.data[0].pdReleFileName;
                let data = {"pdFilePath": filePath}
                console.log(fileName);
                downloadFile(this.buildRequestData(data)).then(res => {
                  this.downloadResponseFile(res, fileName)
                })
              } else {
                for (const pdoperPdVerRls of res.data) {
                  this.PdtempPddatarelease.pdReleFile += pdoperPdVerRls.pdReleFileName + "; ";
                  let filePath = pdoperPdVerRls.pdReleFilePath + "//" + pdoperPdVerRls.pdReleFileName;
                  let fileName = pdoperPdVerRls.pdReleFileName;
                  let data = {"pdFilePath": filePath}
                  console.log(fileName);
                  downloadFile(this.buildRequestData(data)).then(res => {
                    this.downloadResponseFile(res, fileName)
                  })
                }
                this.PdtempPddatarelease.pdReleFile = this.PdtempPddatarelease.pdReleFile.substring(0, this.PdtempPddatarelease.pdReleFile.length - 2)
              }
              this.notifySuccess(res.message);
            })
          }else {
            this.focusItem()
          }
        })
      }
    }
  }
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
  .longInput {
    width: 666px;
  }

  .divclass {
    border: 1px solid #0000002e;
    width: 735px;
    height: auto;
  }
</style>
